6677D67A-999F-4F29-8151-3308967D51D7.name: Named Code Blocks in Symbol List

settings.symbolTransformation:
s/^<<.*?(?:label=)\s*([^\s,>]*)\s*(?:,.*)?>>$/R: $1/; # explicit label
		s/^<<\s*([^\s,>=]+)\s*(?:,.*>>|>>)$/R: $1/; # First entry is a label
	s/^<<.*>>//; # Everything else just wont show up
